name: A torn winter wander
description:
This is a short Christmas game for the Game boy. It's about Liv that's coming home for the holidays to handle her strained relationship. She's drawn into a twilight world of spirits where she undertakes a mysterious year walk, where she might get perspective on things or not.

It's up to you.

Features:

  • A game with a dark Christmas theme.
  • Visual novel!
  • Lots of choices.
  • A sweet short playtime.
  • A sort of unique Game boy game.
  • Explore old nordic customs in your own year walk.
  • Interact with strange norse spirits.

A torn winter wander was made for Christmas 2022 in GB Studio.

Controls: Arrows/WASD = Steer Z = Start/Interact/Accept Enter = Menu
